patterns: can u tell me some jokes
responses: I find it ironic that the colors red, white, and blue stand for freedom until they are flashing behind you.
Money talks. Mine always says goodbye.
I can not believe I got fired from the calendar factory. All I did was take a day off!
Today a man knocked on my door and asked for a small donation towards the local swimming pool. I gave him a glass of water.
I accidentally handed my wife a glue stick instead of chapstick. She still is not talking to me.
Alcohol is a perfect solvent, It dissolves marriages, families, and careers.
My wife just found out I replaced our bed with a trampoline. She hit the roof.
The future, the present, and the past walked into a bar. Things got a little tense.
I started out with nothing, and I still have most of it.
The man who created autocorrect has died. Restaurant in peace.
My first job was working in an orange juice factory, but I got canned. I just could not concentrate.
